CustomField.formula: IF (Text( Case_Notes_are_clearly_documented__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Case_Detail_Populated_Correctly__c ) = "No",0.5,0) + IF (Text( Positive_Tone_in_Response__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Utilized_Correct_Grammer__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Unread_Emails_Closed_Or_Replied_SLA__c ) = "No",0.5,0) + IF (Text( System_Work_Accurately_Completed__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Notes_added_to_CSW_and_or_LifePRO__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Communication_to_Appropriate_Contacts__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Partner_Case_Replied_Within_SLA__c ) = "No",1,0) + IF (Text( Claims_Case_Replied_within_SLA__c ) = "No",1,0)
CustomField.label: Billing Specialist Points Missed
